SELECT a.hymmSeq , a.hymmName , a.hymmId , a.hymmDelNy , b.hysmSeq , b.hyspSeq , b.hymmSeq , b.hysmRoleCd , b.hysmDelNy , c.hyspSeq , c.hyspName , c.hyspDelNy
FROM hybdSpaceMember b LEFT JOIN hybdMember a on a.hymmSeq = b.hymmSeq LEFT JOIN hybdSpace c on c.hyspSeq = b.hyspSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND b.hysmAcceptedNy = '1' AND b.hysmExitNy = '0'

SELECT a.hyspSeq , a.hyspName
FROM hybdSpace a LEFT JOIN hybdSpaceMember b on b.hyspSeq = a.hyspSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND b.hymmSeq = #{hymmSeq} ORDER BY hysmSeq DESC

SELECT a. hyspSeq , a.hyspTypeCd , a.hyspName , b.hymmName , c.hysmRoleCd
FROM hybdSpaceMember c
LEFT JOIN hybdMember b on b.hymmSeq = c.hymmSeq LEFT JOIN hybdSpace a on a.hyspSeq = c.hyspSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND a.hyspSeq = #{hyspSeq} AND b.hymmSeq = #{hymmSeq}
SELECT count(*) FROM hybdSpaceMember WHERE 1=1 AND hyspSeq = #{hyspSeq} AND hysmAcceptedNy = '1'
